text:
#Pfizer #Covid19 #vaccine has been approved for use in the UK & plans are in place to prioritise jabs for the vulnerable & #Keyworkers.

We're sharing regular updates in our network meetings, bulletins, website, socials & WhatsApp groups. Keep tuned at: https://t.co/LJU7C5YhQB https://t.co/SIUJ3etn7M
